title: Drawing, Design for Round Dining Table of Mahogany on Scroll-Like Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Round Dining Table of Mahogany on Scroll-Like Feet
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: DINING TABLE / OF MAHOGANY; at lower center of image with arrow pointing to front feet: carving; at upper right of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4.' 6" diam.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded top with dividing stretcher running across center, raised on fluted columnar support with molded double band around bottom, sitting atop "X"-shaped base terminating in scroll-like feet with carved floral rosettes.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Round Dining Table of Mahogany on Scroll-Like Feet, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-175
